tuv.seg: The Nursing Home Support Scheme replaced the Subvention scheme from 27 October 2009
Cuireadh an Scéim um Thacaíocht Tithe Banaltrais in áit na Scéime Fóirdheontais an 27 Deireadh Fómhair 2009
No new applicants will be accepted
Ní ghlacfar le hiarratasóirí nua
People who are already getting a subvention can choose whichever scheme is to their advantage
Féadfaidh daoine a bhfuil fóirdheontas á fháil acu cheana féin rogha a dhéanamh maidir le cibé scéim is fearr a rachadh chun tairbhe dóibh
The rules for qualifying for a subvention were that you must be:
Ba iad seo a leanas na rialacha ar ghá duit iad a chomhlíonadh chun cáiliú d’fhóirdheontas:
• Sufficiently dependent to require maintenance in a nursing home and
• A bheith i do chleithiúnaí go dtí an pointe go dteastaíonn cúram i dteach altranais uait
• Unable to pay any or part of the cost of maintenance in the home, that is, you must pass a means test
• Gan a bheith in ann íoc as costas nó cuid den chostas cothabhála sa teach altranais, i.e., ní mór scrúdú maoine a shásamh
The means test described here applies only to people who continued on the subvention scheme after the Nursing Home Support Scheme was introduced on 27 October 2009

Níl feidhm ag an tástáil acmhainne ar a gcuirtear síos anseo ach amháin maidir le daoine a chuaigh ar aghaidh chuig an scéim fóirdheontais nuair a tugadh an Scéim Tacaíochta do Thithe Altranais isteach an 27 Deireadh Fómhair 2009
It takes into account the income of yourself and your spouse (or partner)
Cuireann an scrúdú maoine san áireamh d'ioncam féin agus ioncam do chéile (nó páirtí a chónaíonn leat)
It may also take account of your assets (but not those of a spouse or partner)
D'fhéadfadh sé go gcuirfí san áireamh freisin aon sócmhainní atá agat (ach ní chuirfear sócmhainní do chéile/páirtí san áireamh)
Assets in joint names are assessed proportionately
Déantar sócmhainní atá in ainm beirte (nó níos mó) a mheas go comhréireach
The means test involves looking at the income that you and your spouse (or partner) received in the previous 12 months
Déantar scrúdú ar an ioncam a bhí agat féin agus ag do chéile (nó páirtí a chónaíonn in éineacht leat) sa 12 mhí atá caite

Income from all sources is taken into account, including wages, salary, pension, allowances, payments for part-time and seasonal work, income from rentals, investments and savings and all contributions from all sources

Déantar ioncam ó gach foinse a chur san áireamh, pá, tuarastal, pinsean, liúntais, íocaíochtaí ar obair pháirt-aimseartha nó séasúrach, ioncam ó chíos, infheistíochtaí agus airgead i gcoigealtas agus aon ranníocaíochtaí ó aon fhoinse eile
Income is assessed net of social insurance (PRSI), income tax and the health contribution
Déantar an t-ioncam a mheas glan ar ÁSPC, cáin ioncaim agus an ranníocaíocht sláinte
The income of a married or cohabiting person is taken to be half the total income of the couple
Glactar leis gurb é ioncam duine phósta nó duine atá ag maireachtáil le duine eile mar chéile leath an ioncaim iomláin atá ag an lánúin
You may not deliberately try to reduce your income in order to qualify for a subvention, e.g., by diverting it to someone else
Ní féidir leat iarracht a dhéanamh d'ioncam a laghdú d'aon ghnó ar mhaithe le bheith i dteideal deontais, e.g., an t-ioncam a chur i dtreo duine eile
If you do, this income may be taken into account anyway, even if you no longer have access to it
Má dhéanann tú é seo, cuirfear an t-ioncam sin san áireamh ar aon chaoi, fiú muna bhfuil fáil agatsa air a thuilleadh
Your total income for the purposes of the means test is your net income less one-fifth of the weekly rate of the State Pension (Non Contributory) payable at the time
Ar mhaithe leis an scrúdú maoine tugtar d'ioncam iomlán ar d'ioncam glan lúide an cúigiú cuid den ráta seachtainiúil reatha den Phinsean Stáit (Neamh-Ranníocach)
In effect, you must be allowed retain this amount, which is sometimes referred to as pocket money
Mar sin ní mór go mbeadh cead agat an méid sin a choinneáil, ar a dtugtar airgead póca in amanna
Farm or business income
Ioncam feirme nó gnó
Farm, Land or a Business is assessed where the applicant for subvention owns or has legal interest in the Farm, Land or Business
Déanfar measúnú ar Fheirm, ar Thalamh nó ar Ghnó nuair is leis an té a bhfuil fóirdheontas á iarraidh aige nó aici an Fheirm, an Talamh nó an Gnó
The income from a farm or business is calculated on the basis of the previous year's accounts if they are available
Déantar ioncam ó fheirm nó gnó a áireamh ar bhunús cuntas na bliana roimhe más ann dóibh
If they are not, a notional assessment is made of the income
Déantar measúnú barúlach mura mbíonn siad ar fáil

In the case of a farm where there is an income but where accounts are not available for the previous financial year the total farm income, including headage payments, grants, rental income, etc. will be assessed, less current farm expenditure

I gcás feirme ina bhfuil ioncam i gceist ach nach bhfuil cuntais ar fáil i gcomhair na bliana airgeadais roimhe sin déantar ioncam iomlán na feirme lena n-áirítear íocaíochtaí cinn, fóirdheontais, ioncam cíosa, is araile a mheas, lúide caiteachas reatha feirme
Where the farm or business is not being used, a notional income may be assessed, as above, but which also takes account of the capital value of the land or business
Más rud é nach bhfuil feirm nó gnó á úsáid féadfar measúnú barúlach a dhéanamh a chuireann luach caipitil na talún nó an ghnó san áireamh
The following assets may be taken into account:
Is féidir na sócmhainní seo a leanas a chur san áireamh:
• House property (excluding household furniture and goods)
• Maoin tí (ní chuirtear troscán agus earraí tí san áireamh)
• Stocks, shares or securities
• Stoic, scaireanna nó urrúis
• Money on hand, in trust, lodged, deposited or invested
• Airgead ar láimh, in iontabhas, lóisteáilte, i dtaisce nó infheistithe
• Interests in a company or business of any kind (including a farm)
• Leas i gcomhlacht nó i ngnó d’aon chineál (feirm san áireamh)
• Life assurance or endowment policies
• árachas saoil nó polasaithe dearlaice
• Valuables held as investments
• Maoin coinnithe mar infheistíochtaí
• Current value of equipment of a business or machinery, excluding a car, not covered under a previous heading
• Luach reatha ar threalamh gnó nó innealra, gan carr a bheith san áireamh, nár cuireadh san áireamh cheana
If you disposed of any assets in the previous 5 years, the value of those assets may also be taken into account
Má fuair tú réidh le aon sócmhainní le 5 bhliana d'fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh luach na sócmhainní sin curtha san áireamh freisin
That value may include the value of benefit and privilege arising from the transfer
D'fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh luach sochair agus pribhléide a éiríonn as aistriú na sócmhainní a bheith curtha san áireamh freisin

If a business was transferred without any agreement on benefit and privilege, the Health Service Executive (HSE) may take into account any payment on transfer or may impute a notional value of 5% of the market value on the date of transfer, whichever is the higher

Más amhlaidh gur déanadh gnó a aistriú gan aon réiteach ar shochar agus pribhléid, is féidir le Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte (FSS) aon íocaíocht ag am an aistrithe a chur san áireamh nó is féidir luach barúlach de 5% de luach an mhargaidh ar dáta an aistrithe, cibé acu is airde, a chur san áireamh
In the case of a farm transfer, the HSE may take into account any payment on transfer or any continuing income from the earnings of the farm
I gcás feirme a aistriú d’fhéadfadh an FSS aon íocaíocht ag am an aistrithe nó aon ioncam leanúnach ó theacht isteach na feirme a chur san áireamh
The first €11,000 of any assets is not taken into account
Ní mór an chéad €11,000 d'aon sócmhainní a chur as an áireamh

Your principal private residence is not taken into account if it is occupied immediately before the application and continues to be occupied by your spouse, child aged under 21 or in full-time education or relative in receipt of Disability Allowance, Blind Person's Pension, Illness Benefit, Invalidity Pension or State Pension (Non Contributory)

Ní chuirtear do phríomh áit chónaithe san áireamh más ann a bhí tú i do chónaí ag am an iarratais ar dheontas agus má tá aon duine acu seo a leanas fós ina c(h)ónaí ann - do chéile, do chlann atá faoi 21 bliain d'aois nó in oideachas lán-aimseartha nó gaol atá ag fáil aon cheann de na híocaíochtaí seo a leanas, Liúntas Míchumais, Pinsean na nDall, Sochar Breoiteachta, Pinsean Easláinte nó Pinsean Seanaoise (neamhranníocach)
To assess the notional annual income of your house, the HSE takes 5% of the estimated market value if it was not occupied before or at the time of the application by one of the people listed

D'fhéadfadh an FSS 5% den luach measta margaidh a chur san áireamh le measúnú a dhéanamh ar ioncam barúlach bliantúil an tí, muna raibh cónaí ar dhuine amháin de na daoine thuasluaite ann roimh nó ag am an iarratais ar dheontas
This is calculated net of mortgage, loan rental or purchase repayments
Déantar é seo a ríomh glan ar aon mhorgáiste, cíos iasachta nó aisíocaíochtaí ceannaigh
The HSE can only assess the value of your home for a total of three years
Ní féidir le FSS luach an tí sa bhaile a mheas ach ar feadh tréimhse trí bliana san iomlán
If you sell your home, the proceeds may be taken into account in the assessment of your means for a nursing home subvention
Má dhíolann tú do theach d'fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh an t-airgead sin curtha san áireamh mar chuid den scrúdú ioncaim a bhaineann le deontas do theach altranais
(There is a social welfare rule that allows the proceeds of a house sale to be disregarded in certain circumstances
(Tá riail leasa shóisialaigh ann a thugann cead neamhaird a dhéanamh i gcúinsí áirithe
This does not apply to the nursing homes subvention means test)
Ní bhaineann sé seo leis an scrúdú maoine ar dheontas do theach altranais)
The HSE may refuse to pay any subvention if either of the following apply:
D'fhéadfadh sé go ndiúltódh Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte (FSS)deontas a íoc má tá aon cheann den dá chás seo i gceist:

• If your principal residence is valued at €500,000 (for properties in the Dublin area) and €365,000 (for the rest of the country) and your income is greater than the basic rate of State Pension (Non-Contributory) or
• Má tá luach de €500000 (i mBaile Átha Cliath) agus €365,000 (sa chuid eile den tír) ag an bpríomháit chónaithe agus má tá d’ioncam níos mó ná ráta bunúsach den Phinsean Stáit (Neamh-Ranníocach) nó
• The value of your assets (excluding your home) is greater than €36,000
• Má bhíonn luach do shócmhainní, gan do theach a bheith san áireamh, ós cionn €36,000
No new applications for the subvention scheme were accepted after the introduction of the NHSS on 27 October 2009 when the maximum weekly subvention rate was €300
Níor glacadh le haon iarratais nua ar an scéim fóirdheontais tar éis thabhairt isteach na Scéime Tacaíochta do Thithe Altranais an 27 Deireadh Fómhair 2009
If your means are less than the weekly rate of the State Pension (Non-contributory) payable at the time, the HSE may pay an extra subvention
Má bhíonn do mhaoin mheasta níos lú ná an ráta seachtainiúil den Phinsean Stáit (Neamh-Ranníocach) atá dhá íoc ag an am, is féidir leis an FSS deontas breise a íoc

If your only income is a State Pension (Non-contributory), your means are assessed, not at the full amount of your pension, but after a sum equivalent to one fifth of the State Pension (Non-contributory) is disregarded

Muna bhfuil d'ioncam agat ach an Pinsean Stáit (Neamh-Ranníocach), ní dhéantar do mhaoin a mheas ag méid iomlán do phinsin, ach tar éis an chúigiú chuid den Phinsean Stáit (Neamh-Ranníocach) a chur as an áireamh
So, you will be able to get higher than the maximum subvention
Mar sin, beidh tú in ann níos mó ná an t-uasdheontas a fháil
If your means are higher than the rate of State Pension (Non-contributory) payable at the time, plus 20% retained for personal use, the subvention may be reduced by the amount of the excess

Má bhíonn maoin agat atá níos airde ná an ráta den Phinsean Stáit (Neamh-Ranníocach) atá dhá íoc ag an am, móide 20% coinnithe d'úsáid phearsanta, d'fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh an deontas laghdaithe faoin iarmhéid
There are circumstances in which the HSE may pay the full cost of a private nursing home bed
Tá imthosca ann ina bhféadfaidh FSS an costas iomlán a bhaineann le leaba i dteach altranais príobháideach a íoc
This is the case where the HSE has what are called "contracted beds" in private nursing homes
Tá an scéal amhlaidh sna cásanna sin ina bhfuil “leapacha ar chonradh” mar a thugtar orthu ag FSS i dtithe altranais príobháideacha
There are no clear rules about who is entitled to a contracted bed or in what circumstances the HSE offers this arrangement
Níl aon riail daingean leagtha síos faoi cé atá i dteideal leaba ar chonradh a fháil nó faoi na himthosca ina bhféadfaidh FSS an socrú seo a thairiscint
In some circumstances the HSE may make an 'enhanced' payment
Féadfaidh FSS íocaíocht “feabhsaithe” a thairiscint in imthosca áirithe

When considering an enhanced payment, the HSE will take account of the cost of care in the area, the availability of public beds, the means of the applicant and any other funds or assets that may be available to the applicant

Nuair atá íocaíocht feabhsaithe á meas ag FSS cuirfidh sé an costas cúraim sa limistéar sin san áireamh, mar aon leis an méid leapacha poiblí atá ar fáil, acmhainn an iarratasóra agus aon chistí nó sócmhainní eile a d’fhéadfadh a bheith ar fáil don iarratasóir
There is no entitlement to an enhanced subvention contribution; it is at the discretion of the HSE
Níl aon teidlíocht ann maidir le fóirdheontas feabhsaithe; braitheann sé ar lánrogha FSS
The availability of enhanced subvention is limited by the amount of funding available for the scheme
Braithfidh infhaighteacht an fhóirdheontais fheabhsaithe ar an méid maoinithe atá ar fáil don scéim
When a person is being assessed for subvention, a sum equivalent to one fifth of the State Pension (Non-contributory) is disregarded
Nuair atá measúnú dhá dhéanamh ar dhuine do dheontas, déantar neamhaird ar mhéid atá cothrom le aon chúigiú den Phinsean Stáit (Neamh-Ranníocach)
This is often referred to as "pocket money"
Tugtar go minic "airgead póca" air
Payment of the subvention and payments for care
Íocaíocht an deontais agus íocaíochtaí ar chúram
The subvention is paid to the proprietor of the nursing home and not directly to you
Íoctar an deontas le úinéir an teach altranais ní íoctar go díreach leat féin é
The charges for staying in the nursing home are agreed by you (or somebody acting on your behalf) and the nursing home
Aontaíonn tusa (nó duine ag feidhmiú ar do shon) na táillí atá le n-íoc leis an teach altranais
The amount which you have to pay is set out in the contract of care which must be given to you when you go into the nursing home
Leagtar síos an táille atá le n-íoc i gconradh cúraim nach mór a thabhairt duit nuair a théann tú isteach sa teach altranais
The contract of care usually includes a clause which allows for charges to be increased from time to time
Bíonn clás go hiondúil sa chonradh cúraim a deireann gur féidir na táillí a ardú ó am go chéile
You may not be charged any more than the amount as agreed in the contract of care
Ní féidir táille níos airde a ghearradh ort ná an táille atá aontaithe sa chonradh cúraim

This means that there can be no further separate charges for bed and board, nursing care appropriate to the level of dependency, incontinence wear and bedding, laundry service and aids and appliances necessary to assist a dependent person with the activities of daily living

Mar sin ní féidir aon táillí breise a ghearradh ort ar na rudaí seo - leaba agus loistín, cúram altranais a bhraitheann ar an leibhéal cúnaimh a theastaíonn uait, gléasadh coinneálachta agus ábhar leapa, serirbhís níocháin éadaí agus fearas agus trealamh a theastaíonn le cúnamh a chur ar fáil don duine le tascanna maireachtála laethúla
A special service or item of equipment must be the subject of a separate agreement between you and the nursing home and must be set out in the contract of care
Ní mór go mbeadh comhaontú faoi leith idir thú féin agus an teach altranais má tá seirbhís speisialta i gceist nó trealamh faoi leith agus ní mór go mbeadh sé seo leagtha síos sa chonradh cúraim
If you have a nursing home subvention, you must be treated in the same way as a person who does not have a subvention
Má bhíonn deontas agat le n-íoc as teach altranais ní mór caitheamh leat ar an mbealach céanna le duine eile nach bhfuil deontas aige/aici
If a major change occurs in your level of dependency or in your means, the Health Service Executive (HSE) may review your entitlement to a subvention
Má thagann athrú mór ar an leibhéal cúnaimh a theastaíonn uait nó ar do mhaoin, is féidir le Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte (FSS) athbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar do chás
(They also have the power to review every 6 months but this does not happen very often.) The HSE must hold a review if you or the person in charge of the home requests them to do so

(Tá sé de chumhacht ag an mbord freisin athbhreithniú a dhéanamh gach 6 mhí ach ní tharlaíonn sin ach go fíor annamh). Ní mór don FSS athbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar do chás má iarrann tusa nó an té atá i gceannas an tí é
The assessment of dependency and means in the review is carried out in the same way as the initial assessment
Déantar measúnú ar an gcúnamh a theastaíonn uait agus ar do mhaoin don athbhreithniú ar an mbealach céanna agus a déanadh an chéad mheasúnú
As a result of the review, the HSE may increase or decrease the subvention or withdraw it or offer accommodation in a HSE home or make arrangements for your care in your own home

De bharr an athbhreithnithe, d'fhéadfadh sé go ndéanfadh an FSS an deontas a mhéadú nó a laghdú nó é a tharraingt siar ar fad nó lóistín i dteach de chuid an FSS a thairiscint nó socruithe a dhéanamh cúram a chur ar fáil duit i do theach féin
The existing subvention is paid while the review is being conducted
Íoctar an deontas atá ar fáil cheana le linn an athbhreithnithe
If the HSE decide to reduce or stop the subvention, it must notify you and continue to pay the subvention for 28 days
Má dhéanann an FSS cinneadh an deontas a laghdú nó a stopadh ní mór dó é sin a chur in iúl duit agus leanacht leis an deontas a íoc ar feadh 28 lá
You are entitled to appeal against any decision to reduce or withdraw the subvention
Tá sé de cheart agat achomharc a dhéanamh i dtaobh aon chinnithe an deontas a laghdú nó a tharraingt siar
If the appeal is successful the arrears of subvention due will be paid
Má éiríonn leis an achomharc sin íocfar aon riaráistí a bhaineann leis an deontas
Nursing home care and tax allowances
Cúram i dteach altranais agus liúntais chánacha
You or any other person who is paying the costs involved may be able to claim tax relief on the costs of your care in a private nursing home
D'fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh tú nó aon duine eile atá ag íoc na gcostas a bhaineann le teach altranais in ann faoiseamh cánach a éileamh ar chostais an chúraim i dteach altranais phríobháideach
View information on tax relief on nursing home fees and for dependent relatives here
Féach faisnéis maidir le faoiseamh cánach ar tháillí tithe altranais agus ar son gaolta
If you are unhappy with a decision on your subvention, you may appeal to the Appeals Officer in HSE Consumer Affairs in your local area
Ní féidir achomharc a dhéanamh i dtaobh an mheasúnaithe a rinneadh ar an gcúram a theastaíonn uait
You may appeal against the assessment of means and/or the amount of the subvention
Is féidir achomharc a lorg ar an scrúdú maoine agus/nó méid an deontais
You should appeal within 28 days of receiving the notification of the decision
Ba cheart duit achomharc a dhéanamh taobh istigh de 28 lá ón lá a fhaigheann tú fógra maidir leis an gcinneadh
You are entitled to know the details of the decision and the reasons for it
Tá sé de cheart agat sonraí an chinnithe a bheith ar eolas agat agus na fáthanna a bhaineann leis
Details of the means assessment should be provided by the HSE but if they are not or they are not clear, you should look for further information
Ba cheart don FSS sonraí maidir leis an scrúdú maoine a sholáthar duit ach muna bhfuileadar curtha ar fáil nó sách soiléar duit ba cheart duit tuilleadh eolais a lorg
The regulations do not say that you are entitled to an oral hearing but, if you feel that would be an advantage, you should ask for one
Níl sé leagtha síos sna rialacha go bhfuil duine i dteideal éisteachta béil, ach má cheapann tú go mbeadh sí ina buntáiste is féidir leat éisteacht béil a iarraidh
The appeals officer must give a decision on the appeal within 28 days
Ní mór don oifigeach achomhairc cinneadh ar achomharc a thabhairt taobh istigh de 28 lá
Decisions of the appeal officer are subject to review by the Ombudsman and may be subject to judicial review by the courts
Is féidir le Fear an Phobail athbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar chinneadh an oifigigh achomhairc agus is féidir leis na cúirteanna athbhreithniú a dhéanamh freisin ar an gcinneadh
No new applications are accepted for this scheme, following the introduction of the Nursing Home Support Scheme
Níltear ag glacadh le haon iarratais nua ar an scéim sin tar éis thabhairt isteach na Scéime Tacaíochta do Thithe Altranais
